name: Spellcasting Collection
description: Steve Meretzky's trilogy of magic-themed collegiate text adventures-with-graphics for Legend. The sometimes-smutty but never-beyond-softcore stories put the player in the shoes of one Ernie Eaglebeak, a wizard-in-training at at Sorcerer University.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Pentium 4, Athlon 64 or later Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Athlon 64 or later Storage: 256 MB available space
